str.main: Reset the program settings to their default values. You will need to restart!
str.alt: Reset the program settings to their default values. You will need to restart!

str.main: Forex Strategy Builder uses the account exchange rate to calculate the trading statistics in your account currency.
str.alt: Forex Strategy Builder uses the account exchange rate to calculate the trading statistics in your account currency.

str.main: When your account currency does not take part in the trading couple the account exchange rate is a fixed figure.
str.alt: When your account currency does not take part in the trading couple the account exchange rate is a fixed figure.

str.main: Show long/short balance lines on the chart and more statistics in the overview.
str.alt: Show long/short balance lines on the chart and more statistics in the overview.

str.alt: Logic and Parameters of the Indicators

str.alt: The logical group of the slot.

str.alt: Open a new long position or add to an existing position

str.main: Open a new long position or add to a winning position
str.alt: Open a new long position or add to a winning position

str.main: Open a new short position or add to an existing position
str.alt: Open a new short position or add to an existing position

str.alt: Open a new short position or add to a winning position

str.main: when the following logic condition is satisfied
str.alt: when the following logic condition is satisfied

str.main: when at least one of the following logic conditions is satisfied
str.alt: when at least one of the following logic conditions is satisfied

str.main: when all the following logic conditions are satisfied
str.alt: when all the following logic conditions are satisfied

str.main: The slots show the logic for the long positions only.
str.alt: The slots show the logic for the long positions only.

str.main: Forex Strategy Builder automatically computes the proper logic for the short positions.
str.alt: Forex Strategy Builder automatically computes the proper logic for the short positions.

str.main: Always trade a constant number of lots.
str.alt: Always trade a constant number of lots.

str.main: Entry signal in the direction of the present position:
str.alt: Entry signal in the direction of the present position:

str.main: No averaging is allowed. Cancel any additional orders which are in the same direction.
str.alt: No averaging is allowed. Cancel any additional orders which are in the same direction.

str.main: Add to a winning position but not to a losing one. If the position is at a loss, cancel the additional entry order. Do not exceed the maximum allowed number of lots to open.
str.alt: Add to a winning position but not to a losing one. If the position is at a loss, cancel the additional entry order. Do not exceed the maximum allowed number of lots to open.

str.main: Add to the position no matter if it is at a profit or loss. Do not exceed the maximum allowed number of lots to open.
str.alt: Add to the position no matter if it is at a profit or loss. Do not exceed the maximum allowed number of lots to open.

str.main: Entry signal in the opposite direction:
str.alt: Entry signal in the opposite direction:

str.main: No modification of the present position is allowed. Cancel any additional orders which are in the opposite direction.
str.alt: No modification of the present position is allowed. Cancel any additional orders which are in the opposite direction.

str.main: Reduce the present position. If its amount is lower than or equal to the specified reducing lots, close it.
str.alt: Reduce the present position. If its amount is lower than or equal to the specified reducing lots, close it.

str.main: Close the present position regardless of its amount or result. Do not open a new position until the next entry signal has been raised.
str.alt: Close the present position regardless of its amount or result. Do not open a new position until the next entry signal has been raised.

str.main: Close the existing position and open a new one in the opposite direction using the entry rules.
str.alt: Close the existing position and open a new one in the opposite direction using the entry rules.

str.main: The strategy does not provide a permanent loss limitation.
str.alt: The strategy does not provide a permanent loss limitation.

str.main: The Permanent Stop Loss limits the loss of a position to
str.alt: The Permanent Stop Loss limits the loss of a position to

str.main: pips per open lot (plus the charged spread and rollover).
str.alt: pips per open lot (plus the charged spread and rollover).

str.main: The strategy does not use a Permanent Take Profit.
str.alt: The strategy does not use a Permanent Take Profit.

str.main: The Permanent Take Profit closes a position at
str.alt: The Permanent Take Profit closes a position at

str.main: The position's Stop Loss will be set to Break Even price when the profit reaches
str.alt: The position's Stop Loss will be set to Break Even price when the profit reaches

str.main: Use the indicator value from the previous bar for all asterisk-marked indicators!
str.alt: Use the indicator value from the previous bar for all asterisk-marked indicators!

str.main: The averaging rules apply to the entry signals only. Exit signals close a position. They cannot open, add or reduce one.
str.alt: The averaging rules apply to the entry signals only. Exit signals close a position. They cannot open, add or reduce one.
